title: Tuning Fork & Quartz Crystal Set | KonMari by Marie Kondo
description: The tuning fork & clear quartz crystal are a dynamic duo. Strike the tuning fork against the crystal to produce pure tones to restore your sense of balance. Tuning forks are one of Marie Kondo's favorite self-care tools. Watch Marie demonstrate how to use a tuning fork here https://konmari.com/how-to-use-a-tuning-fork/
cleaned_text: Quartz Crystal Set [](/products/konmari-decor-konmari-tuning-fork-crystal-set-quartz) Tuning Fork & Quartz Crystal Set Marie uses a tuning fork in her everyday life to help her to reset - and she's never without a crystal. Each of these tuning kits includes a proprietary KonMari tuning fork and accompanying crystal. Different crystals support specific rituals and intentions, so each set has a particular focus: balance, strength or unconditional love. Made of aluminum alloy, our tuning fork has a frequency of 4,096 hertz. Pair it with the accompanying crystal, try it with other crystals or use it on its own — allow your rituals to adapt according to the changing needs of daily life! Each set comes with one tuning fork and the choice of one crystal: Clear Quartz: symbolizes grounding energy and enhanced clarity of the mind — mental, spiritual and emotional Smoky Quartz: symbolizes strength, thoughtful communication and protection and power in times of difficulty Rose Quartz: symbolizes unconditional love Watch Marie demonstrate [how to use a tuning fork](https://konmari.com/how-to-use-a-tuning-fork/).
